Chapter 2522 - Chapter 2522: Lu Ming’S Face

Chapter 2522: Lu Ming’s face

Translator: 549690339 |

After that, the immemorial body cultivators also brought a large number of body cultivators to the Dragon Emperor Peak to cultivate.

On the other hand, bubbles, Feng Ling, Long Chen, Ouyang Wushuang, and the others had also brought their men to the Dragon sovereign peak.

After all, the path-understanding ancient tree could not be found everywhere, especially the path-understanding ancient tree that was three thousand meters tall. The cultivation environment here was much better than many other places.

Some people who were on good terms with Lu Ming and some other forces came to the Dragon sovereign peak to cultivate. In a short time, a large number of experts had gathered there.

Lu Ming also gave out the combat weapons he had obtained from netherworld mountain.

For example, Lu Ming gave the few heavenly emperors who cultivated the immemorial body cultivation a combat weapon that was equivalent to a heavenly Dao soldier.

As for Lu Ming himself, he sat at the Dragon sovereign peak and cultivated in peace.

Xie nianqing, Lu shenhuang, and the others were naturally at the Dragon sovereign peak as well. They were often by Li Ping and Lu Yuntian’s side, so the old couple was naturally happy every day.

In the blink of an eye, half a year had passed.

As for the matter regarding the Dragon Emperor Peak, it had also spread out, shocking many people in the heaven realm.

“I didn’t expect Lu Ming to have another path-understanding ancient tree!”

even among the peak experts, only a few people have this!

Many people in the heaven realm were discussing.

Time flew by, and another year passed.

There was no such thing as an impervious wall in this world. The news that Lu Ming had a weapon that was equivalent to a heaven Dao soldier and that he even had a fruit of life spread.

This time, it really caused a great shock in the heaven realm.

Greed rose in countless people’s hearts, and many powerful forces were disloyal.

A few higher-ups in a powerful faction were discussing this matter.

sect master, Lu Ming not only controls the path-understanding ancient tree, but he also has a weapon at the level of a heavenly soldier. He even has a heaven-defying treasure like the fruit of life. If we can get it, our strength will definitely soar!

“Right, why don’t we take it!”

A few higher-ups suggested.

no, the common enemy of the heaven realm is the evil god tribe. If we attack Lu Ming, I’m afraid the ancestral Dragon will not let us off!

“Moreover, I heard that Lu Ming has a good relationship with a few of the top ten combat beasts!”

The sect master said.

if we can’t do it openly, we can do it secretly. We can snatch Lu Ming’s treasures in secret!

Someone suggested, revealing a ruthless expression.

this won’t do. Lu Ming has many experts around him. Not only are there the nine heavenly emperors from the chaos Hall, but there are also experts from the Archean body cultivators. There are unparalleled experts there. They won’t be easy to deal with!

The sect master said.

As for Lu Ming’s own ability, they were not very concerned.

After all, the ancestral Dragon had ordered everyone to keep the incident in netherworld mountain a secret.

“Then what should we do?”

Someone asked.

“Lu Ming is an unparalleled genius with too many powerhouses behind him. It’s too risky to deal with him. We’d better observe first. It’ll be best if someone takes the lead!”

The sect master said.

It was not only this force. Many other forces did not dare to make a move in the end. They planned to observe first.

For a time, there were some undercurrents in the Tai Qing heavenly region.

In a courtyard at the Dragon sovereign peak, Lu Ming and Xie nianqing were chatting.

Every time Lu Ming cultivated for a period of time, he would take some time to rest and spend time with his family.

now, the news that you have a heaven Dao soldier-level weapon and a fruit of life has spread. These are all priceless items. Aren’t you afraid of being coveted by others? ”

Xie nianqing smiled.

“We’re afraid?”

Lu Ming smiled.

With their current strength, who were they afraid of?

Xie nianqing also smiled. Whoever missed him could only blame their bad luck.

however, it’s not good to be remembered every day. After all, we’re all from the heaven realm, and we’ll have to fight the enemy together in the future. I’ll dispel their thoughts!

Lu Ming said with a smile.

A few days later, a piece of news spread throughout the Tai Qing heavenly region.

Three months later, Lu Ming would invite one of the top ten war beasts, the nine-headed Golden Lion Qing Cang, to give a lecture at the Dragon sovereign peak. At that time, everyone was welcome to come and listen to the lecture.

The news caused an uproar in the Tai Qing heavenly region.

What kind of existence was the nine-headed Golden Lion Qing Cang? He was a creature that had been famous since ancient times. He had the cultivation of a peak heavenly Emperor and was extremely powerful.

The fact that Lu Ming was able to invite Qing Cang to give a lecture at the Dragon sovereign peak was enough to show how close Lu Ming and Qing Cang were.

The powerful forces that had their eyes on Lu Ming’s treasures were like a bucket of cold water that was splashed on their heads when they heard this news. They immediately dispelled the idea of attacking Lu Ming.

What a joke. In the past, there were rumors that Lu Ming had a good relationship with the top ten combat beasts. However, those were just rumors.

But now, Lu Ming could be invited to give a lecture. Their relationship was not only good.

Wasn’t it courting death to go against such an expert?

In the following three months, countless powerhouses from the Tai Qing heavenly region gathered at the Dragon Emperor Peak. There were even many powerhouses of the heavenly Emperor realm.

For a time, the Dragon sovereign peak was filled with experts.

On this day, three months later, Qing Cang arrived as promised and gave a lecture.

A peak heavenly Emperor’s understanding of cultivation had already reached an extremely profound realm. Countless people benefited from this lecture, and even some heavenly emperors were greatly inspired.

It should be known that there were not many peak heavenly emperors in the entire heaven realm, especially after the ancient war. Those who died or were injured were all in seclusion to cultivate or recuperate. Who would come out to give a lecture? it was very rare.

After this lecture, Lu Ming released another important piece of news.

Ten years later, he would invite another peak heavenly Emperor to give a Dao lecture at the Dragon sovereign peak.

The crowd was even more shocked. Lu Ming could actually invite a peak heavenly Emperor to give a lecture. This level of energy was shocking.

Those forces that had designs on Lu Ming completely extinguished their thoughts.

Although the treasure was important, he had to be alive to take it.

Everyone was looking forward to the arrival of ten years later.

Ten years passed in the blink of an eye to experts.

Ten years later, Lu Ming invited a peak heavenly Emperor from the prison suppression field to give a lecture at the Dragon sovereign peak.

This time, there were even more people coming to Dragon Emperor Peak to listen to the Dao. It was simply a sea of people.

At the same time, after the lecture ended, Lu Ming promised that a peak heavenly Emperor would also give a lecture ten years later.

Everyone was shocked. Lu Ming was able to invite such a person. How many powerful people did he have connections with?

This time, many of them decided to stay and cultivate near the Dragon Emperor Peak!

Anyway, there was the path-understanding ancient tree at the Dragon Emperor Peak. The cultivation environment was also top-notch in the heaven realm. Moreover, Lu Ming had an open attitude and welcomed others to come here to cultivate.

This time, dandan finally came out of his closed-door cultivation not long after. His cultivation base had reached the peak of the heavenly Emperor realm. He had planned to go into closed-door cultivation in one go and continue to break through to the demigod realm, but he was dragged here by Lu Ming. He worked hard for three months near the Dragon sovereign peak and set up a large array.

After setting up the formation, dandan ran away. No one knew where she went to enter closed-door cultivation to break through.

With the great formation set up by dandan, the Dragon sovereign peak had truly become a top-notch cultivation place.
